net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living

クラス LivingEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
      • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.EntityEvent
        • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingEvent
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    AnimalTameEvent, EnderTeleportEvent, LivingAttackEvent, LivingDamageEvent, LivingDeathEvent, LivingDestroyBlockEvent, LivingDropsEvent, LivingEntityUseItemEvent, LivingEquipmentChangeEvent, LivingEvent.LivingJumpEvent, LivingEvent.LivingUpdateEvent, LivingExperienceDropEvent, LivingFallEvent, LivingHealEvent, LivingHurtEvent, LivingKnockBackEvent, LivingPackSizeEvent, LivingSetAttackTargetEvent, LivingSpawnEvent, LootingLevelEvent, PlayerEvent, PotionColorCalculationEvent, PotionEvent, SleepingLocationCheckEvent

    public class LivingEvent
extends EntityEvent
    LivingEvent is fired whenever an event involving Living entities occurs.
    If a method utilizes this Event as its parameter, the method will receive every child event of this class.

    All children of this event are fired on the MinecraftForge.EVENT_BUS.

      LivingUpdateEvent is fired when an Entity is updated.
